author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Introduce an analyzer which prints out cell parameters of high granularity calorimeter and can be used to compare geometries created by DDD and DD4Hep

#### PR validation:

Tested using the cfg files in Geometry/HGCalGeometry/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx237 Validation of Cell paprameters for HGCal in DDD vs DD4Hep
